name: Muscle Cramps
description: Muscle cramps are sudden, involuntary contractions of one or more muscles.
solution: Stay hydrated eat balanced meals with enough electrolytes and stretch regularly.

name: Running Injury
description: Running injuries can include shin splints, runner's knee, or stress fractures.
solution: Rest, apply ice, compress and elevate the injured area, and consult a doctor or physical therapist.

name: High Blood Pressure
description: High blood pressure can lead to heart disease and stroke.
solution: Reduce salt intake, maintain a healthy weight, exercise regularly, and manage stress.

name: Weight Loss Plateau
description: Weight loss plateaus occur when your body adapts to your weight loss efforts and fat loss slows down.
solution: Switch up your exercise routine, focus on nutrition, and get enough sleep.

name: Proper Form
description: Maintaining proper form during exercise helps prevent injuries and ensures you're working the right muscles.
solution: Educate yourself on correct techniques, use mirrors, and consider hiring a personal trainer.

name: Hydration
description: Staying hydrated is crucial for overall health and helps improve performance during exercise.
solution: Drink water regularly throughout the day especially before and after workouts.
